name: conceptually
content:

in a way that relates to ideas or principles: The categories themselves are conceptually distinct. Conceptually, this is a huge change for the medical profession. See
conceptual
More examplesFewer examplesOur method is conceptually simple and produces useful and easily readable maps.Conceptually, I knew this job would fit with the things that are important to me.He performed one of the most conceptually beautiful experiments of all time.
